stories.Title: Still committed to AI
stories.Description: In the aftermath of a tumultuous weekend at OpenAI, Microsoft's CEO Satya Nadella remains confident about the organization's resilience while emphasizing the necessity for governance change.
stories.Tweet: Still committed to AI 📦 In the aftermath of a tumultuous weekend at OpenAI, Microsoft's CEO Satya Nadella remains confident about the organization's resilience while emphasizing the necessity for governance change. #openai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/11/20/microsoft-ceo-nadella-says-openai-governance-needs-to-change-no-matter-where-altman-ends-up.html

stories.Title: It was almost a merge
stories.Description: One of the many twists and turns in the OpenAI saga is the fact that the CEO of a rival firm was initially approached to lead the company, however, Anthropic's Dario Amodei was quick to decline.
stories.Tweet: It was almost a merge 📦 One of the many twists and turns in the OpenAI saga is the fact that the CEO of a rival firm was initially approached to lead the company, however, Anthropic's Dario Amodei was quick to decline. #openai https://interestingengineering.com/culture/openai-asked-anthropic-to-replace-sam-altman

stories.Title: Get to know Emmett Shear
stories.Description: In case you missed it, OpenAI has welcomed Emmett Shear, former head of Twitch, as its new interim CEO. The successor to Altman sees this as a unique opportunity to make a mark.
stories.Tweet: Get to know Emmett Shear 📦 In case you missed it, OpenAI has welcomed Emmett Shear, former head of Twitch, as its new interim CEO. The successor to Altman sees this as a unique opportunity to make a mark. #openai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/11/20/who-is-emmett-shear-the-new-openai-ceo-taking-over-from-sam-altman.html

stories.Title: To the moon and beyond
stories.Description: India isn't resting after its successful moon landing. Instead, the country maintains its space ambitions. This time, it's planning Chandrayaan-4, a lunar sample-return mission.
stories.Tweet: To the moon and beyond 📦 India isn't resting after its successful moon landing. Instead, the country maintains its space ambitions. This time, it's planning Chandrayaan-4, a lunar sample-return mission. #rocketscience https://www.space.com/india-moon-sample-return-mission-chandrayaan-4

stories.Title: Starliner is coming
stories.Description: NASA has recently confirmed that the first crewed launch of Boeing’s CST-100 Starliner remains scheduled for mid-April, highlighting promising progress in resolving technical issues.
stories.Tweet: Starliner is coming 📦 NASA has recently confirmed that the first crewed launch of Boeing’s CST-100 Starliner remains scheduled for mid-April, highlighting promising progress in resolving technical issues. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/starliner-on-track-for-april-crewed-test-flight/

stories.Title: The SUSIE initiative
stories.Description: There's a ray of light coming to European spaceflight thanks to ArianeGroup. The company has been diligently working on SUSIE, a project that aims to boost cargo and human transport.
stories.Tweet: The SUSIE initiative 📦 There's a ray of light coming to European spaceflight thanks to ArianeGroup. The company has been diligently working on SUSIE, a project that aims to boost cargo and human transport. #rocketscience https://spacenews.com/arianegroup-begins-testing-prototype-of-multirole-susie-upper-stage/

stories.Title: A Christmas miracle?
stories.Description: SpaceX's holiday surprise comes from CEO Elon Musk, who announced plans for Starship's third flight, set to take off in just 3 to 4 weeks.
stories.Tweet: A Christmas miracle? 📦 SpaceX's holiday surprise comes from CEO Elon Musk, who announced plans for Starship's third flight, set to take off in just 3 to 4 weeks. #spacex https://www.digitaltrends.com/space/elon-musk-reveals-readiness-date-for-starship-3rd-flight/

stories.Title: The center of it all
stories.Description: Recent sightings from the James Webb Telescope have treated us to a magnificent look at the center of the Milky Way, challenging our understanding of star formation.
stories.Tweet: The center of it all 📦 Recent sightings from the James Webb Telescope have treated us to a magnificent look at the center of the Milky Way, challenging our understanding of star formation. #space https://www.engadget.com/webb-telescope-images-show-an-unprecedented-and-chaotic-view-of-the-center-of-our-galaxy-185912370.html

stories.Title: A trip to the beach
stories.Description: Elon Musk claimed that the Cybertruck would be waterproof and able to float. It appears these claims are being put to the test, as the electric pickup was spotted taking a dip in the Gulf of Mexico.
stories.Tweet: A trip to the beach 📦 Elon Musk claimed that the Cybertruck would be waterproof and able to float. It appears these claims are being put to the test, as the electric pickup was spotted taking a dip in the Gulf of Mexico. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/11/21/tesla-spotted-driving-cybertruck-into-water-float/

stories.Title: Nothing but bad news
stories.Description: Sadly, Nothing's attempt to bridge the gap between iOS and Android users has failed. Nothing Chats, the iMessage-like app was quickly removed from the Play Store due to privacy concerns.
stories.Tweet: Nothing but bad news 📦 Sadly, Nothing's attempt to bridge the gap between iOS and Android users has failed. Nothing Chats, the iMessage-like app was quickly removed from the Play Store due to privacy concerns. #nothing https://gizmodo.com/nothing-messages-imessage-failed-workaround-1851037126

title: Microsoft sticks with OpenAI, India's lunar journey continues, Cybertruck takes a dip
description: The OpenAI scene keeps unfolding, however, Microsoft's CEO Satya Nadella jumps in, saying no worries—they're all-in on pushing AI forward. India made headlines with Chandrayaan-3, and now they're eyeing the moon again for a sample-return mission. By the way, did anyone catch a wild sight in the Gulf of Mexico? That was no mirage, it was the Cybertruck hitting the beach.
